title: 93x11: Applicability of 26 U.S.C. § 1043 to Sale by a Government Official
summary: Discusses rules for divestiture, contemplated sale of asset management company, and states that a divestiture cannot leave the official with a substantive stake in the company which is subject to the future performance of its business affairs, as that would provide an unfair or unintended benefit to the government official.
